ing: 5 cups chopped cooked chicken breast meat
des: "The combination of citrus and tarragon in this chicken salad make it delicious. I crave it all summer long because of its fresh flavors. This salad can also be made in advance and chilled."
ins: Mix the chicken, celery, green onions, and tarragon together in a large bowl. Stir in the lemon juice, lemon zest, orange zest, and mayonnaise. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes before serving.
